name: black ruler bangle
description:
vintage aluminum ruler bracelet
with a hinge!

bold, lightweight and easy to put on
(numbers will vary)

1/2" (13mm) wide

name: round screw earrings
description:
wood screws cast in silver 
with silver posts and backs
they come as a mixed pair slotted and phillips on a little block of wood
1/4" diameter

name: nut hoops
description:
Little silver or brass nut hoops are the perfect earring to leave in all the time.  They are also great for second holes.
The exquisite little mechanism clicks closed so you can put them on and forget about them.
1/2" diameter

name: small screw earrings
description:
tiny wood screws cast in brass or silver 
with silver posts and backs
they come as a mixed pair slotted and phillips on a little block of wood
3/16" [6mm] diameter

name: extension ruler cuff
description:
This bracelet features a vintage extension ruler (you know, the little bit that slides out on a zig-zag ruler for inside measurements). It is soldered to a thick band of sterling and is great for men or women.  When in doubt about your size, just send me your wrist measurement and I will do the rest.
5/16" (8mm) wide

name: gear tier earrings
description: These delicate earrings are made from vintage pocket watch gears

name: ruler ring
description:
My newest ruler ring!
It's cast from a vintage ruler with nice deep marks, plus bonus polkadots inside.
7/16" [11mm] wide

name: wide ruler ring
description:
Nice ruler ring cast in sterling silver from a vintage ruler with marks inside too!

1/2" wide

name: maybe ring
description:
Why say yes or no when MAYBE will do?
This ring covers all situations.
sterling silver, of course
band is 1/4" [7mm] wide

name: 4 thimbles necklace brass
description:
beautiful vintage thimbles smashed and riveted
brass and sterling
on a 2mm oxidized, snake chain
available with a 16", 18" or 20" chain

name: thimble ring
description:
this sweet, delicate little ring is made from the tip of a vintage brass thimble

soldered to a 1/2" silver disk
on a thin band 1/16" [2mm] wide

available in whole and half sizes

name: vintage ruler cufflink
description:
silver and vintage brass ruler 
7/8" diameter

name: ruler cuff bracelet
description:
I have cast a vintage ruler to make this simple, striking cuff bracelet.  It is great for men and women.  When in doubt about your size, just send me your wrist measurement and I will do the rest.
1/2" (13mm) wide

name: large screw earrings
description:
These bold wood screw earrings are cast in brass or sterling silver
with silver posts and heavy duty backs.
they come as a mixed pair ~ phillips and slotted
3/8" [9mm] diameter

name: I.D. bracelet
description:
This photo-etched fingerprint bracelet is brass and lined with silver.
(no, they're not my prints)
It is about 3/4" wide

name: checkers rings
description:
Check these out!
Vintage wooden checkers bezel set in silver.
Specify if you want a red or black checker in messages during checkout.
3/4"  and 1" diameter

name: safety pin ring
description:
The safety pin was invented in 1849 by Walter Hunt an American mechanic.  I love the exquisite perfect simplicity of the safety pin.
Tiny brass safety pin soldered to a slightly domed silver band.

3/8" [10mm] wide

name: Sisters Mirabal coin bracelet
description:
Using coins from the Dominican Republic, I've cut out the Sisters Mirabal, political dissidents who fought against the president-turned-dictator Trujillo to try and restore democracy to their country.
The coins are nickel.
With a keyhole clasp and silver rivets.

name: screw tip earrings
description:
After more than twenty years (yikes!) of making the screw earrings, it has finally occurred to me that the business end of the screws might be a neat earring too.  They are great in combination with your screw earrings and aren't too pointy (I wear mine 24/7).
1/4" [6mm] tall
Available in silver or brass with silver posts and backs.

name: threads earrings
description:
Sterling silver threads cast from a tiny bolt-another great earring that you can leave in all the time.
1/4" [6mm] wide
silver posts and backs

name: wiggly earrings
description:
These have great slinky action when worn and a nice locking ear wire. Made from riveted silver tubing.
2.25" (58mm) long
They are also available shorter (1.75") in the drop down menu.

name: brass wiggly earring
description:
These have great slinky action when worn and a nice locking ear wire. Made from riveted brass tubing.
2.5" (65mm) long
They are also available shorter (2") in the drop down menu.

name: bone button fringe necklace
description:
victorian, bone buttons and oxidized silver necklace  
length: 24" adjusts as small as you like
fringe is 4" at longest point

available oxidized (pictured) or in plain silver

name: button stack necklace
description:
victorian bone buttons
on a 22" (adjusts to 24") silver chain

name: bone button earrings
description:
victorian bone buttons and sterling silver
~all soldered~
3.5" (90mm) long
available oxidized or in plain silver

name: 3+5=8 bracelet
description:
This playful, colorful (and mathematically accurate)  bracelet is made   with a vintage wooden math toy bezel set in sterling silver.
2" x 7" x .25" thick

name: yellow O bracelet
description:
vintage wooden math toy
bezel set in silver with a slide clasp

2" wide x 7" long

name: Y necklace
description:
Why not?
This necklace is made from a vintage wooden toy letter which I've bezel set in sterling silver.  I do have other letters, but they are not nearly as rebellious.
The necklace is also reversible for days when screaming yellow will not do.

18" silver chain (adjusts to 16")

name: terminal lug flower pin
description:
The many petals of this flower pin are vintage electric terminal lugs.
The pin is brass and copper with a hand made spring clasp on the back.

name: round screw cufflinks
description:
cast from round head screws in silver

mixed phillips and slotted

9/16" (14mm)

all soldered

name: Round Screw Tux Studs
description: Round phillips screws cast in sterling.   Studs slide through button hole.

name: ruler cufflinks
description:
I've cast these vintage rulers in sterling silver.
Other numbers (1-5) are available by request.
1" wide 1/2" tall
The backs are soldered on of course.

name: keyhole cufflinks
description:
cufflinks cast in silver from a keyhole
9/16" [15mm] diameter

name: no cash value cufflinks
description: These are made from vintage arcade tokens with silver backs soldered on.  I have, however, assigned a cash value to them...

name: screw cufflinks
description:
These simple and sophisticated cufflinks are cast in sterling silver from phillips and slotted screws.  Cool and funny at the same time, so if ya gotta wear a suit...

9/16" across
the finding is soldered on

name: Flat Screw Tux Studs
description: Flat phillips screws cast in sterling silver.  Studs slide through button hole.

name: gear key ring
description: brass gear on a silver ring

name: sinker key ring
description: I've cast a 1oz fishing sinker in brass (or you can get a solid sterling one too).  On a sterling keyring.

name: ruler key ring
description:
a couple inches of a vintage brass ruler on a sterling key ring
1" diameter ring

numbers will vary
(it doesn't hurt to ask if you have a specific one in mind)

name: 4 thimbles necklace ~silvery~
description:
beautiful vintage thimbles smashed and riveted
[probably) nickel plated brass thimbles and sterling silver
on a 2mm oxidized, snake chain
available with a 16", 18" or 20" chain

name: for amusement only ring
description:
vintage brass arcade token
on a wedge-shaped silver band

spins! [but is for amusement only]

token is 3/4" diameter
available in whole and half sizes

name: alphabet ring
description:
silver ring with the alphabet soldered on
3/8" wide

name: no cash value ring
description:
An old arcade token soldered on a  silver band.
(does actually have a cash value)

name: crown ring
description:
vintage gallery wire soldered to silver a band

3/8" wide

available in whole and half sizes

name: pencil pins
description:
bronze, silver, goldstone and paint
pencil pins
